page.title: 08Community Care
page.content: There are several old people living in the villages, one 85 year old living on his own. He has had hip and eye operations, helped when he came home by neighbours, relatives and a nurse calling most days. Now he has Home Help two days a week. Also the W.V.S. bring a dinner on two days. Another pensioner has a home nurse to assist her to bath. The more infirm have a Home Care Attendant to help them to wash and dress, light their fire and give them their breakfast. Neighbours and relatives helping later. Our local W.I. have a list of members who will take anyone without transport to the clinic or fetch any medications. Also the Red Cross will loan any aids that will help in any way.
